# Add BMRCL Champs deployment details (2025-11-14 03:28Z)

_**User (2025-11-13 04:58Z)**_

There is another deployment to be added in the @deployments.astro page. BMRCL Champs is software solution that helps us keep track of the PRs  who are taking care of our Transigo Devices at the Bangalore metro stations where our kiosks are deployed.

There are two solutions in it - webapp(for admins) and android app (for PRs, team lead and manager)

The android helps mark attendance for PRs with geolocation, schedule and complete tasks, take leaves, view devices, view transactions and so on! There are multiple photos in assets in the bmrcl_champs. Use that to add the newly deployed android app and webapp. 

---

_**Agent (model default, mode Agent)**_

+           &lt;p class=&quot;case-study-intro&quot;&gt;
+             A comprehensive software solution empowering BMRCL to track, manage, and optimize field operations for PRs maintaining TransiGo devices across Bangalore metro stations.

---


Added the BMRCL Champs deployment section to the deployments page. Summary:

## Changes Made:

1. **Imported all 10 BMRCL Champs images** at the top of the file

2. **Added a new case study section** for BMRCL Champs that includes:
   - Title: "BMRCL Champs · Field Operations Management"
   - Introduction describing the solution
   - Two feature cards highlighting:
     - **Android App** features (for PRs, Team Leads & Managers)
     - **Web Application** features (for Administrators)
   - Image gallery displaying all 10 screenshots
   - Impact highlight section

3. **Added responsive CSS styles** for:
   - Feature cards grid (2 columns on desktop, 1 on mobile)
   - Image gallery with hover effects
   - Mobile-responsive breakpoints

The section follows the same design pattern as the other case studies (Namma Metro, Navigo Series, CTS Solutions) and uses the glassmorphism design system with the brand's lime-green accent color.

The section is placed after the CTS Solutions section and before the final CTA, maintaining the page flow. All images are lazy-loaded for performance, and the layout is fully responsive across all screen sizes.

---

_**User (2025-11-13 04:58Z)**_

ok

---


Re-added the BMRCL Champs section to the deployments page. It includes:

- **Image imports**: All 10 BMRCL Champs screenshots
- **Case study section** with:
  - Title and introduction
  - Two feature cards (Android App and Web Application)
  - Image gallery with all 10 screenshots
  - Impact highlight
- **Responsive CSS styles** for all screen sizes

The section uses direct image tags (no React component) and follows the same design pattern as the other case studies. It's positioned after the CTS Solutions section and before the final CTA.

The gallery images have hover effects, and the layout is responsive across desktop, tablet, and mobile.
